text:
actionable procedure that you can use to work through your time series forecasting problem
and get better than average performance from your model. After reading this tutorial, you will
know:
 A systematic four-step process that you can use to work through any time series forecasting
problem.
 A list of models to evaluate and the order in which to evaluate them.
 A methodology that allows the choice of a ﬁnal model to be defensible with empirical
evidence, rather than whim or fashion.
